title: What classic movies should I catch up on during quarantine? - Quora

response.answer_text: William Wyler films. Ingmar Bergman Films (one from each decade). Billy Wilder films. Superfly. Claudine. The Thin Man series. Any Marilyn Monroe film. I Want to Live (gut-wrenching so be prepared). Houseboat. It Happened One Night. The Lady Eve. Westward the Women. How Green Was My Valley. The 39 Steps (both versions) The Man Who Knew Too Much (both versions) Romeo & Juliet (Olivia Hussey) Wait Until Dark (watch it at night in a dark room). …… come back to me when you’re done!!! Enjoy.
